LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.</div><div class='line' id='LC792'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC793'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES AND UNDER NO LEGAL THEORY, WHETHER TORT</div><div class='line' id='LC794'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), CONTRACT, OR OTHERWISE, SHALL YOU, THE</div><div class='line' id='LC795'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;INITIAL DEVELOPER, ANY OTHER CONTRIBUTOR, OR ANY DISTRIBUTOR OF</div><div class='line' id='LC796'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;COVERED SOFTWARE, OR ANY SUPPLIER OF ANY OF SUCH PARTIES, BE</div><div class='line' id='LC797'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;LIABLE TO ANY PERSON FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR</div><div class='line' id='LC798'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY CHARACTER INCLUDING, WITHOUT</div><div class='line' id='LC799'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;LIMITATION, DAMAGES FOR LOST PROFITS, LOSS OF GOODWILL, WORK</div><div class='line' id='LC800'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;STOPPAGE, COMPUTER FAILURE OR MALFUNCTION, OR ANY AND ALL OTHER</div><div class='line' id='LC801'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;COMMERCIAL DAMAGES OR LOSSES, EVEN IF SUCH PARTY SHALL HAVE BEEN</div><div class='line' id='LC802'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;INFORMED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.  THIS LIMITATION OF</div><div class='line' id='LC803'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;LIABILITY SHALL NOT APPLY TO LIABILITY FOR DEATH OR PERSONAL</div><div class='line' id='LC804'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;INJURY RESULTING FROM SUCH PARTY&#39;S NEGLIGENCE TO THE EXTENT</div><div class='line' id='LC805'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;APPLICABLE LAW PROHIBITS SUCH LIMITATION.  SOME JURISDICTIONS DO</div><div class='line' id='LC806'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF INCIDENTAL OR</div><div class='line' id='LC807'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, SO THIS EXCLUSION AND LIMITATION MAY NOT</div><div class='line' id='LC808'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;APPLY TO YOU.</div><div class='line' id='LC809'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC810'>8. U.S. GOVERNMENT END USERS.</div><div class='line' id='LC811'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC812'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Covered Software is a &quot;commercial item,&quot; as that term is</div><div class='line' id='LC813'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;defined in 48 C.F.R. 2.101 (Oct. 1995), consisting of &quot;commercial</div><div class='line' id='LC814'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;computer software&quot; (as that term is defined at 48</div><div class='line' id='LC815'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.F.R. 252.227-7014(a)(1)) and &quot;commercial computer software</div><div class='line' id='LC816'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;documentation&quot; as such terms are used in 48 C.F.R. 12.212</div><div class='line' id='LC817'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Sept. 1995).  Consistent with 48 C.F.R. 12.212 and 48</div><div class='line' id='LC818'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.F.R. 227.7202-1 through 227.7202-4 (June 1995), all</div><div class='line' id='LC819'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;U.S. Government End Users acquire Covered Software with only those</div><div class='line' id='LC820'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rights set forth herein.  This U.S. Government Rights clause is in</div><div class='line' id='LC821'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lieu of, and supersedes, any other FAR, DFAR, or other clause or</div><div class='line' id='LC822'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;provision that addresses Government rights in computer software</div><div class='line' id='LC823'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;under this License.</div><div class='line' id='LC824'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC825'>9. MISCELLANEOUS.</div><div class='line' id='LC826'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC827'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This License represents the complete agreement concerning subject</div><div class='line' id='LC828'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;matter hereof.  If any provision of this License is held to be</div><div class='line' id='LC829'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unenforceable, such provision shall be reformed only to the extent</div><div class='line' id='LC830'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;necessary to make it enforceable.  This License shall be governed</div><div class='line' id='LC831'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;by the law of the jurisdiction specified in a notice contained</div><div class='line' id='LC832'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;within the Original Software (except to the extent applicable law,</div><div class='line' id='LC833'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if any, provides otherwise), excluding such jurisdiction&#39;s</div><div class='line' id='LC834'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;conflict-of-law provisions.  Any litigation relating to this</div><div class='line' id='LC835'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;License shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts located</div><div class='line' id='LC836'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in the jurisdiction and venue specified in a notice contained</div><div class='line' id='LC837'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;within the Original Software, with the losing party responsible</div><div class='line' id='LC838'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for costs, including, without limitation, court costs and</div><div class='line' id='LC839'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;reasonable attorneys&#39; fees and expenses.  The application of the</div><div class='line' id='LC840'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale</div><div class='line' id='LC841'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of Goods is expressly excluded.  Any law or regulation which</div><div class='line' id='LC842'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;provides that the language of a contract shall be construed</div><div class='line' id='LC843'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against the drafter shall not apply to this License.  You agree</div><div class='line' id='LC844'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that You alone are responsible for compliance with the United</div><div class='line' id='LC845'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;States export administration regulations (and the export control</div><div class='line' id='LC846'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;laws and regulation of any other countries) when You use,</div><div class='line' id='LC847'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;distribute or otherwise make available any Covered Software.</div><div class='line' id='LC848'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC849'>10. RESPONSIBILITY FOR CLAIMS.</div><div class='line' id='LC850'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC851'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As between Initial Developer and the Contributors, each party is</div><div class='line' id='LC852'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;responsible for claims and damages arising, directly or</div><div class='line' id='LC853'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indirectly, out of its utilization of rights under this License</div><div class='line' id='LC854'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and You agree to work with Initial Developer and Contributors to</div><div class='line' id='LC855'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;distribute such responsibility on an equitable basis.  Nothing</div><div class='line' id='LC856'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;herein is intended or shall be deemed to constitute any admission</div><div class='line' id='LC857'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of liability.</div><div class='line' id='LC858'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC859'>---------------------------------------------------------------------</div><div class='line' id='LC860'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC861'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Apache License</div><div class='line' id='LC862'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Version 2.0, January 2004</div><div class='line' id='LC863'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;http://www.apache.org/licenses/</div><div class='line' id='LC864'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC865'>TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR USE, REPRODUCTION, AND DISTRIBUTION</div><div class='line' id='LC866'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC867'>1. Definitions.</div><div class='line' id='LC868'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC869'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;License&quot; shall mean the terms and conditions for use, reproduction,</div><div class='line' id='LC870'>&nbsp;&nbsp;and distribution as defined by Sections 1 through 9 of this document.</div><div class='line' id='LC871'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC872'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Licensor&quot; shall mean the copyright owner or entity authorized by</div><div class='line' id='LC873'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the copyright owner that is granting the License.</div><div class='line' id='LC874'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC875'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Legal Entity&quot; shall mean the union of the acting entity and all</div><div class='line' id='LC876'>&nbsp;&nbsp;other entities that control, are controlled by, or are under common</div><div class='line' id='LC877'>&nbsp;&nbsp;control with that entity. For the purposes of this definition,</div><div class='line' id='LC878'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;control&quot; means (i) the power, direct or indirect, to cause the</div><div class='line' id='LC879'>&nbsp;&nbsp;direction or management of such entity, whether by contract or</div><div class='line' id='LC880'>&nbsp;&nbsp;otherwise, or (ii) ownership of fifty percent (50%) or more of the</div><div class='line' id='LC881'>&nbsp;&nbsp;outstanding shares, or (iii) beneficial ownership of such entity.</div><div class='line' id='LC882'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC883'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;You&quot; (or &quot;Your&quot;) shall mean an individual or Legal Entity</div><div class='line' id='LC884'>&nbsp;&nbsp;exercising permissions granted by this License.</div><div class='line' id='LC885'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC886'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Source&quot; form shall mean the preferred form for making modifications,</div><div class='line' id='LC887'>&nbsp;&nbsp;including but not limited to software source code, documentation</div><div class='line' id='LC888'>&nbsp;&nbsp;source, and configuration files.</div><div class='line' id='LC889'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC890'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Object&quot; form shall mean any form resulting from mechanical</div><div class='line' id='LC891'>&nbsp;&nbsp;transformation or translation of a Source form, including but</div><div class='line' id='LC892'>&nbsp;&nbsp;not limited to compiled object code, generated documentation,</div><div class='line' id='LC893'>&nbsp;&nbsp;and conversions to other media types.</div><div class='line' id='LC894'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC895'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Work&quot; shall mean the work of authorship, whether in Source or</div><div class='line' id='LC896'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Object form, made available under the License, as indicated by a</div><div class='line' id='LC897'>&nbsp;&nbsp;copyright notice that is included in or attached to the work</div><div class='line' id='LC898'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(an example is provided in the Appendix below).</div><div class='line' id='LC899'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC900'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Derivative Works&quot; shall mean any work, whether in Source or Object</div><div class='line' id='LC901'>&nbsp;&nbsp;form, that is based on (or derived from) the Work and for which the</div><div class='line' id='LC902'>&nbsp;&nbsp;editorial revisions, annotations, elaborations, or other modifications</div><div class='line' id='LC903'>&nbsp;&nbsp;represent, as a whole, an original work of authorship. For the purposes</div><div class='line' id='LC904'>&nbsp;&nbsp;of this License, Derivative Works shall not include works that remain</div><div class='line' id='LC905'>&nbsp;&nbsp;separable from, or merely link (or bind by name) to the interfaces of,</div><div class='line' id='LC906'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the Work and Derivative Works thereof.</div><div class='line' id='LC907'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC908'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Contribution&quot; shall mean any work of authorship, including</div><div class='line' id='LC909'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the original version of the Work and any modifications or additions</div><div class='line' id='LC910'>&nbsp;&nbsp;to that Work or Derivative Works thereof, that is intentionally</div><div class='line' id='LC911'>&nbsp;&nbsp;submitted to Licensor for inclusion in the Work by the copyright owner</div><div class='line' id='LC912'>&nbsp;&nbsp;or by an individual or Legal Entity authorized to submit on behalf of</div><div class='line' id='LC913'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the copyright owner. For the purposes of this definition, &quot;submitted&quot;</div><div class='line' id='LC914'>&nbsp;&nbsp;means any form of electronic, verbal, or written communication sent</div><div class='line' id='LC915'>&nbsp;&nbsp;to the Licensor or its representatives, including but not limited to</div><div class='line' id='LC916'>&nbsp;&nbsp;communication on electronic mailing lists, source code control systems,</div><div class='line' id='LC917'>&nbsp;&nbsp;and issue tracking systems that are managed by, or on behalf of, the</div><div class='line' id='LC918'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensor for the purpose of discussing and improving the Work, but</div><div class='line' id='LC919'>&nbsp;&nbsp;excluding communication that is conspicuously marked or otherwise</div><div class='line' id='LC920'>&nbsp;&nbsp;designated in writing by the copyright owner as &quot;Not a Contribution.&quot;</div><div class='line' id='LC921'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC922'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;Contributor&quot; shall mean Licensor and any individual or Legal Entity</div><div class='line' id='LC923'>&nbsp;&nbsp;on behalf of whom a Contribution has been received by Licensor and</div><div class='line' id='LC924'>&nbsp;&nbsp;subsequently incorporated within the Work.</div><div class='line' id='LC925'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC926'>2. Grant of Copyright License. Subject to the terms and conditions of</div><div class='line' id='LC927'>&nbsp;&nbsp;this License, each Contributor hereby grants to You a perpetual,</div><div class='line' id='LC928'>&nbsp;&nbsp;worldwide, non-exclusive, no-charge, royalty-free, irrevocable</div><div class='line' id='LC929'>&nbsp;&nbsp;copyright license to reproduce, prepare Derivative Works of,</div><div class='line' id='LC930'>&nbsp;&nbsp;publicly display, publicly perform, sublicense, and distribute the</div><div class='line' id='LC931'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Work and such Derivative Works in Source or Object form.</div><div class='line' id='LC932'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC933'>3. Grant of Patent License. Subject to the terms and conditions of</div><div class='line' id='LC934'>&nbsp;&nbsp;this License, each Contributor hereby grants to You a perpetual,</div><div class='line' id='LC935'>&nbsp;&nbsp;worldwide, non-exclusive, no-charge, royalty-free, irrevocable</div><div class='line' id='LC936'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(except as stated in this section) patent license to make, have made,</div><div class='line' id='LC937'>&nbsp;&nbsp;use, offer to sell, sell, import, and otherwise transfer the Work,</div><div class='line' id='LC938'>&nbsp;&nbsp;where such license applies only to those patent claims licensable</div><div class='line' id='LC939'>&nbsp;&nbsp;by such Contributor that are necessarily infringed by their</div><div class='line' id='LC940'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Contribution(s) alone or by combination of their Contribution(s)</div><div class='line' id='LC941'>&nbsp;&nbsp;with the Work to which such Contribution(s) was submitted. If You</div><div class='line' id='LC942'>&nbsp;&nbsp;institute patent litigation against any entity (including a</div><div class='line' id='LC943'>&nbsp;&nbsp;cross-claim or counterclaim in a lawsuit) alleging that the Work</div><div class='line' id='LC944'>&nbsp;&nbsp;or a Contribution incorporated within the Work constitutes direct</div><div class='line' id='LC945'>&nbsp;&nbsp;or contributory patent infringement, then any patent licenses</div><div class='line' id='LC946'>&nbsp;&nbsp;granted to You under this License for that Work shall terminate</div><div class='line' id='LC947'>&nbsp;&nbsp;as of the date such litigation is filed.</div><div class='line' id='LC948'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC949'>4. Redistribution. You may reproduce and distribute copies of the</div><div class='line' id='LC950'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Work or Derivative Works thereof in any medium, with or without</div><div class='line' id='LC951'>&nbsp;&nbsp;modifications, and in Source or Object form, provided that You</div><div class='line' id='LC952'>&nbsp;&nbsp;meet the following conditions:</div><div class='line' id='LC953'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC954'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) You must give any other recipients of the Work or</div><div class='line' id='LC955'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Derivative Works a copy of this License; and</div><div class='line' id='LC956'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC957'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) You must cause any modified files to carry prominent notices</div><div class='line' id='LC958'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;stating that You changed the files; and</div><div class='line' id='LC959'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC960'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(c) You must retain, in the Source form of any Derivative Works</div><div class='line' id='LC961'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that You distribute, all copyright, patent, trademark, and</div><div class='line' id='LC962'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;attribution notices from the Source form of the Work,</div><div class='line' id='LC963'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;excluding those notices that do not pertain to any part of</div><div class='line' id='LC964'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Derivative Works; and</div><div class='line' id='LC965'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC966'>&nbsp;&nbsp;(d) If the Work includes a &quot;NOTICE&quot; text file as part of its</div><div class='line' id='LC967'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;distribution, then any Derivative Works that You distribute must</div><div class='line' id='LC968'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;include a readable copy of the attribution notices contained</div><div class='line' id='LC969'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;within such NOTICE file, excluding those notices that do not</div><div class='line' id='LC970'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pertain to any part of the Derivative Works, in at least one</div><div class='line' id='LC971'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the following places: within a NOTICE text file distributed</div><div class='line' id='LC972'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as part of the Derivative Works; within the Source form or</div><div class='line' id='LC973'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;documentation, if provided along with the Derivative Works; or,</div><div class='line' id='LC974'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;within a display generated by the Derivative Works, if and</div><div class='line' id='LC975'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wherever such third-party notices normally appear. The contents</div><div class='line' id='LC976'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the NOTICE file are for informational purposes only and</div><div class='line' id='LC977'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do not modify the License. You may add Your own attribution</div><div class='line' id='LC978'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;notices within Derivative Works that You distribute, alongside</div><div class='line' id='LC979'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;or as an addendum to the NOTICE text from the Work, provided</div><div class='line' id='LC980'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that such additional attribution notices cannot be construed</div><div class='line' id='LC981'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as modifying the License.</div><div class='line' id='LC982'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC983'>&nbsp;&nbsp;You may add Your own copyright statement to Your modifications and</div><div class='line' id='LC984'>&nbsp;&nbsp;may provide additional or different license terms and conditions</div><div class='line' id='LC985'>&nbsp;&nbsp;for use, reproduction, or distribution of Your modifications, or</div><div class='line' id='LC986'>&nbsp;&nbsp;for any such Derivative Works as a whole, provided Your use,</div><div class='line' id='LC987'>&nbsp;&nbsp;reproduction, and distribution of the Work otherwise complies with</div><div class='line' id='LC988'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the conditions stated in this License.</div><div class='line' id='LC989'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC990'>5. Submission of Contributions. Unless You explicitly state otherwise,</div><div class='line' id='LC991'>&nbsp;&nbsp;any Contribution intentionally submitted for inclusion in the Work</div><div class='line' id='LC992'>&nbsp;&nbsp;by You to the Licensor shall be under the terms and conditions of</div><div class='line' id='LC993'>&nbsp;&nbsp;this License, without any additional terms or conditions.</div><div class='line' id='LC994'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the above, nothing herein shall supersede or modify</div><div class='line' id='LC995'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the terms of any separate license agreement you may have executed</div><div class='line' id='LC996'>&nbsp;&nbsp;with Licensor regarding such Contributions.</div><div class='line' id='LC997'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC998'>6. Trademarks. This License does not grant permission to use the trade</div><div class='line' id='LC999'>&nbsp;&nbsp;names, trademarks, service marks, or product names of the Licensor,</div><div class='line' id='LC1000'>&nbsp;&nbsp;except as required for reasonable and customary use in describing the</div><div class='line' id='LC1001'>&nbsp;&nbsp;origin of the Work and reproducing the content of the NOTICE file.</div><div class='line' id='LC1002'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC1003'>7. Disclaimer of Warranty. Unless required by applicable law or</div><div class='line' id='LC1004'>&nbsp;&nbsp;agreed to in writing, Licensor provides the Work (and each</div><div class='line' id='LC1005'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Contributor provides its Contributions) on an &quot;AS IS&quot; BASIS,</div><div class='line' id='LC1006'>&nbsp;&nbsp;WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or</div><div class='line' id='LC1007'>&nbsp;&nbsp;implied, including, without limitation, any warranties or conditions</div><div class='line' id='LC1008'>&nbsp;&nbsp;of TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY, or FITNESS FOR A</div><div class='line' id='LC1009'>&nbsp;&nbsp;PARTICULAR PURPOSE. You are solely responsible for determining the</div><div class='line' id='LC1010'>&nbsp;&nbsp;appropriateness of using or redistributing the Work and assume any</div><div class='line' id='LC1011'>&nbsp;&nbsp;risks associated with Your exercise of permissions under this License.</div><div class='line' id='LC1012'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC1013'>8. Limitation of Liability. In no event and under no legal theory,</div><div class='line' id='LC1014'>&nbsp;&nbsp;whether in tort (including negligence), contract, or otherwise,</div><div class='line' id='LC1015'>&nbsp;&nbsp;unless required by applicable law (such as deliberate and grossly</div><div class='line' id='LC1016'>&nbsp;&nbsp;negligent acts) or agreed to in writing, shall any Contributor be</div><div class='line' id='LC1017'>&nbsp;&nbsp;liable to You for damages, including any direct, indirect, special,</div><div class='line' id='LC1018'>&nbsp;&nbsp;incidental, or consequential damages of any character arising as a</div><div class='line' id='LC1019'>&nbsp;&nbsp;result of this License or out of the use or inability to use the</div><div class='line' id='LC1020'>&nbsp;&nbsp;Work (including but not limited to damages for loss of goodwill,</div><div class='line' id='LC1021'>&nbsp;&nbsp;work stoppage, computer failure or malfunction, or any and all</div><div class='line' id='LC1022'>&nbsp;&nbsp;other commercial damages or losses), even if such Contributor</div><div class='line' id='LC1023'>&nbsp;&nbsp;has been advised of the possibility of such damages.</div><div class='line' id='LC1024'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC1025'>9. Accepting Warranty or Additional Liability. While redistributing</div><div class='line' id='LC1026'>&nbsp;&nbsp;the Work or Derivative Works thereof, You may choose to offer,</div><div class='line' id='LC1027'>&nbsp;&nbsp;and charge a fee for, acceptance of support, warranty, indemnity,</div><div class='line' id='LC1028'>&nbsp;&nbsp;or other liability obligations and/or rights consistent with this</div><div class='line' id='LC1029'>&nbsp;&nbsp;License. However, in accepting such obligations, You may act only</div><div class='line' id='LC1030'>&nbsp;&nbsp;on Your own behalf and on Your sole responsibility, not on behalf</div><div class='line' id='LC1031'>&nbsp;&nbsp;of any other Contributor, and only if You agree to indemnify,</div><div class='line' id='LC1032'>&nbsp;&nbsp;defend, and hold each Contributor harmless for any liability</div><div class='line' id='LC1033'>&nbsp;&nbsp;incurred by, or claims asserted against, such Contributor by reason</div><div class='line' id='LC1034'>&nbsp;&nbsp;of your accepting any such warranty or additional liability.</div><div class='line' id='LC1035'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC1036'>END OF TERMS AND CONDITIONS</div><div class='line' id='LC1037'><br/></div><div class='line' id='LC1038'>---------------------------------------------------------------------</div></pre></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
        </table>
  </div>

  </div>
</div>

<a href="#jump-to-line" rel="facebox[.linejump]" data-hotkey="l" class="js-jump-to-line" style="display:none">Jump to Line</a>
<div id="jump-to-line" style="display:none">
  <form accept-charset="UTF-8" class="js-jump-to-line-form">
    <input class="linejump-input js-jump-to-line-field" type="text" placeholder="Jump to line&hellip;" autofocus>
    <button type="submit" class="button">Go</button>
  </form>
</div>

        </div>

      </div><!-- /.repo-container -->
      <div class="modal-backdrop"></div>
    </div><!-- /.container -->
  </div><!-- /.site -->


    </div><!-- /.wrapper -->
